Quelle Quote

Interact with a quote-hoarding chatbot. Users can add quotes to a quotelist, then request a random one via the quote-command. Chatbot responds with quotes when specific words are used (kind of like Slackbot-responses)

Description

A basic chat-app to become more familiar with the usage of real-time utilities like Socket.io. You can chat with whoever's in the chat room at the moment, and Quotebot will always be present too.

You can interact with the bot using pre-defined text message commands. You can add a quote to the list by using '.addquote', followed by your sentence. It will be sent+inserted into a MongoDB-database, then confirmed when done. You can use '.quote' to retrieve a random quote. Fun for group chats and memories!

Technologies

  • CSS
  • JavaScript

  • Node.js

  • Client-side
